source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SEQ_00<tab>As is her wont, Qeshi-Rae wants to discuss the samiel with you.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SEQ_00<tab>ミーン工芸館のケシ・レイは、シムーンについて考察したいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_00<tab>Gather information in Lydha Lran.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_00<tab>リダ・ラーンでマオ・ラッドの目撃情報を集める

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Qeshi-Rae.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_01<tab>ケシ・レイと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_02<tab>Search for Mao-Ladd.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_02<tab>マオ・ラッドを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather a shred of ancient animal skin at Timh Gyeus)) ((Deliver the shred of ancient animal skin to Qeshi-Rae)) /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((ティム・グースで<var 28 ((Item)) F2688401 /var>を採集)) ((<var 28 ((Item)) F2688401 /var>をケシ・レイに納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Qeshi-Rae at the Crystalline Mean.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_TODO_04<tab>ミーン工芸館のケシ・レイと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Acht-la Ormh Inn.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_900本クエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：漆黒のヴィランズ」の、
「アクトラ・オルワ・イン」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_000<tab>Yes, this is truly a mystery... We <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> that the samiel is out there─it's left plenty of evidence of its passage. So why can't we find it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_000よーし、痕跡は順調に集まっているのに、
相変わらずシムーンの本体が、見つからない理由を、
改めて考えてみようか！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_001<tab><huff> <wheeze> Ch-Chief! We have a problem!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_001はぁ、はぁ……ケ、ケシ・レイ科長……！
大変です……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_002<tab>Yalana, you should know better than to run at full tilt! You're an academic─you're liable to kill yourself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_002ヤラーナ、大丈夫かい……！
頭脳労働者が全力疾走なんて、自殺行為だよ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_004<tab>N-Never mind me! It's Mao─he's gone off to Il Mheg to search for the samiel...alone!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_004だ、だめですが……それどころではないんです……！
マオ・ラッドが、ひとりでシムーンを探しに、
イル・メグへ向かってしまったんです！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_005<tab>He's what!?
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_005<tab>なんだってー！？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_006<tab>The other researchers, they blamed him for putting the idea of the samiel into your head. “It's because of you she's chasing some fool myth,” they jeered.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_006ほかの研究員がマオに対して、
「お前がシムーンなど非現実的なことを吹聴したせいで、
　ケシ・レイ科長まで愚かになってしまった」と言ったんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_007<tab>Mao couldn't bear their barbs, and in his anger, he rushed off with little more than the clothes on his back!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_007それにマオはひどく反発して、飛び出していって……。
でも、身を護る心得のない研究員が、
ひとりで外に出るなんて、無謀すぎます……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_008<tab>There's no time to waste! We must find him before he runs afoul of the faeries!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_008よりにもよって、イル・メグだなんて……！
妖精たちに惑わされて、命を落とす危険だってあるんだぞ！
すぐにでも連れ戻しに行かないと！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_009<tab>B-But, Chief! What if <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> run afoul of the faeries?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_009待ってください、科長！
そんなことしたら、我々まで妖精に惑わされる可能性も……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_010<tab>We'll have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> with us. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> has friends among the pixies. Isn't that right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>くんがいるから、大丈夫。
君は、イル・メグの妖精とも親しいんだよね？
案内を頼めるかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_011<tab>I see... Yes, we'd be much assured if you could ask the pixies of Lydha Lran after Mao's whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_011なるほど、イル・メグの南にある集落、
「リダ・ラーン」のピクシーたちと親交があると……。
それならマオの姿を見てないか、聞き込みをお願いしたいです！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_012<tab>While you see to that, Yalana and I will cast around by the entrance. Come and find us after you've made your inquiries. Now then, let us hurry!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_012じゃあ私たちはイル・メグの入口あたりでマオを探そう。
すまないけど、情報が集まったら合流してくれるかな？
マオの命がかかってるから……よろしく頼むよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_020<tab>The man with the big ears? Ooh, yes, I know the one! Was chasing him, as a matter of fact!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_020お耳のおっきい男のヒト？
さっき「姿見の湖」の西で見たけど、
見失っちゃった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_021<tab>Unfortunately, I lost sight of him west of the lake. If I see him again, I'll turn him into a cute leafman! Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_021次に見つけたら、
かっわいい草人になってもらうんだー♪

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237B_000_022<tab>What!? A mortal's come here to play!? Nobody told me that! That's not fair! I'm so bored! Bored, bored, bored! I want to play with him too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237B_000_022えっ！？　ヒトが遊びにきてたなんて、知らなかった！
ずるいー！　ヒト見たいー！　あそびたいー！
つまんないー！　つまんないのやだー！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237C_000_023<tab>Hmmm? That mortal's your friend, you say? Had I known that, I would've greeted him with a shove into the lake! Tee hee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237C_000_023なぁに？　さっきのヒト、あなたのお友だちだったの？
じゃあ、背中をとんって押して、遊んであげればよかった！
「姿見の湖」の際を歩いていたから……フフフ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>It appears Mao-Ladd is somewhere near Longmirror Lake. Time to take word to the others, who await you at Timh Gyeus.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_024マオ・ラッドは、「姿見の湖」辺りで目撃されていたようだ……。
「ティム・グース」入口付近のケシ・レイたちにも、
目撃情報を伝えよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_025<tab>I've only dared set foot in Il Mheg a few times. The place is at once beautiful and terrifying.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_025イル・メグは数回しか足を踏み入れたことがないけれど……
あいかわらず、魅力的かつ恐ろしい場所だね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_026<tab>Oh, where are you, Mao?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_026マオー！　どこですかー！
怒らないから出てきてくださいよー！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_027<tab>I lost sight of the man with the big ears west of the lake.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_027お耳のおっきい男のヒト？
さっき「姿見の湖」の西で見たけど、
見失っちゃった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_028<tab>If I see him again, I'll turn him into a cute leafman! Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237A_000_028次に見つけたら、
かっわいい草人になってもらうんだー♪

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237B_000_029<tab>Nobody told me about the mortal! That's not fair! I'm so bored! Bored, bored, bored! I want to play with him too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237B_000_029ヒトが遊びにきてたなんて、知らなかった！
ずるいー！　ヒト見たいー！　あそびたいー！
つまんないー！　つまんないのやだー！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237C_100_029<tab>Had I known that mortal was your friend, I would've greeted him with a shove into the lake! Tee hee hee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_PIXIE03237C_100_029なぁに？　さっきのヒト、あなたのお友だちだったの？
じゃあ、背中をとんって押して、遊んであげればよかった！
「姿見の湖」の際を歩いていたから……フフフ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_030<tab>There you are. Were you able to learn anything about Mao's whereabouts?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_030やあやあ、マオの手がかりについて、
なにかわかったことはあったかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_031<tab>Truly? Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We could never have located him without your help!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_031なんと！
もうマオの居場所を聞き出せたのかい！？
君に案内を頼んで、正解だったよ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_032<tab>Come, let's make haste to Longmirror Lake. Quickly and quietly does it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_032「姿見の湖」だったっけ？
よし、じゃあみんなでそっちに移動しよう！
妖精に襲われないように、はぐれずについてきてね！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_035<tab>What were you thinking, lad? You could've been killed, or worse!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_035マオ！
よかった、無事だったんだね……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_036<tab>He's safe, thank goodness. It's a miracle he managed to come this far unharmed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_036こんなところまで、ひとりで来ていたなんて……。
奇跡的に無事だったから、よかったものの……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm so sorry for all the trouble!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_040)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
すみません、ご心配をかけたようで……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_041<tab>And so you should be! The chief alone is enough of a handful─I can't chase you down as well!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_041本当ですよ、まったくもう！
ケシ・レイ科長だけじゃなく、あなたまで飛び出し癖がついたら、
私ひとりでは対処しきれません！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_042<tab>B-But the others, they spoke ill of the chief. I couldn't just stand by and take it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_042だって、ほかのやつらに、
ケシ・レイ科長を侮辱されたような気がして……
許せなかったんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_043<tab>I know it was reckless of me to come out here alone...but thanks to that, I was able to find an actual part of the samiel!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_043でも、おかげで、
シムーンの体の一部と思われるものを見つけたんですよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_044<tab>There's...er, just one problem─in my haste, I forgot my tools. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you seem to have yours. Could you do the collecting in my stead?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_044ただ僕、採集道具を忘れちゃってて……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
どうか、採ってきてくれませんか……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_045<tab>Lest you wonder, it's a shred of scaly skin. I spotted it in this area, Timh Gyeus, after noticing rub marks on the trees and rocks.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_045ここ周辺、「ティム・グース」の岩肌や樹木に、
体をこすりつけたような痕があったんです！
その近くで「」の採集をお願いします！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_050<tab>I spotted the skin in this area, Timh Gyeus, after noticing rub marks on the trees and rocks. Please collect it in my stead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_050ここ周辺、「ティム・グース」の岩肌や樹木に、
体をこすりつけたような痕があったんです！
その近くで「」の採集をお願いします！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_052<tab>While droppings can tell us much about a creature, there's no substitute for an actual piece of it. In spite of myself, I'm quite excited, I must admit!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_052本当にシムーンの体の一部が発見されたら……
特定作業が、ぐんとはかどりますね……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_060<tab>So, did you find the shred of skin?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_060なになに？
「」が見つかったかい！？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_061<tab>Mmm-hmmm! While it's a little on the shriveled side, this is indeed skin from the creature. It was likely molting.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_061ふむふむ、これは……！
確かに皮膚片のようだけど、古くてしなびているな……。
出血の形跡もないから、脱皮したと考えてよさそうだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_062<tab>A molting creature! That's one more thing we know about it! I can't wait to see what else this specimen can tell us!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_062ということは、脱皮の習性を持つ生物……！
特定にも一役買いそうですね！
早く持って帰って、分析したいです！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_063<tab>The s-s-samiel! It's b-b-behind you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_063ケシ・レイ科長、ヤラーナさん！！
うしろ、うしろ……うしろにシムーンらしきものが……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_064<tab>Hm? I don't see anything.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_064<tab>いないよ？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_065<tab>Me neither.
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_065<tab>いませんね。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_066<tab>Th-That's odd... It was there just a moment ago. And its shape─I'd swear it matches that of the shadow I saw in Amh Araeng.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_066あ、あれ？
でも本当に、さっきはいたんですよ！
アム・アレーンで見かけた影と、形も一緒でした！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_067<tab>I don't know how, but it literally disappeared in the blink of an eye.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_067で、でも、目を離したら、
一瞬のうちにいなくなってしまって……
潜ってしまったのかもしれません……。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_068<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you saw it too, didn't you? It wasn't just my imagination?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_068僕、嘘ついてないですよね！？
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
あなたも見ましたよね！？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_069<tab>Truly!? It was right there, and I missed it!? Gah, of all the rotten luck!
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_069<tab>ほんとなの！？　ぐううう、悔しいなぁ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_070<tab>Tell me, what did it look like? What was its color? Smell? Size?
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_070私も見たかったよ、どんな姿をしてた！？
なにか、既知の生物に似ていたりしてた！？
色は！？　匂いは！？　大きさは！？

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_071<tab>Chief, perhaps we should save the questions for after we leave this place. Even with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it may not be entirely safe for us here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_071科長、その話は長くなりそうだから、
ひとまずここを離れましょう……。
はやく園芸館に戻りたいです。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_072<tab>Yes, you have the right of it. It wouldn't do to have the faeries get their hands on our precious specimen. Come, let's return to the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_072そうだね……せっかく手に入れた痕跡を、
妖精にいたずらされちゃたまらないもんな！
じゃあ、みんなで「ミーン工芸館」へ戻ろう！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_075<tab>Thank you for helping us to find Mao-Ladd. I shudder to think what may have happened to him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_YALANA_000_075)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
うちの研究員を助けてくださって……
本当にありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_076<tab>Anger carried my steps to Il Mheg, but it quickly gave way to terror. I'm in your debt.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_MAOLADD_000_076怒りに身を任せて飛び出したはいいものの……
イル・メグにひとりでいるのは、本当に恐ろしかったです……。
助けに来てくれて、ありがとうございました……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_080<tab>Well, that was certainly a harrowing outing, but it wasn't without fruit─in the form of a piece of the samiel itself! Ahhh, to feel the scaly texture in my hands and breathe in its mysterious smell... Pure bliss, I tell you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_080いやぁー、大変だったね！
でもマオが見つかってよかったよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_081<tab>Alas, Yalana snatched it from me before I could have a little taste...
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_081おかげで有力な検体も手に入ったしね！
観察して頬ずりして、匂いを嗅いで味見しようとしたけど……
ヤラーナに没収されちゃった。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_082<tab>Well, for now we'll just have to leave her to her task. I'm sure she'll have new information for us before long, so do not wander far!
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_082いまは、彼女たちに分析を任せているよ。
必ずやシムーンの正体を絞り込んでみせるから、
少しの間だけ、待っていてほしいな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>The next request will be available from Qeshi-Rae upon reaching level 78 as a miner or botanist.
target:
TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_SYSTEM_000_090次の納品依頼は、
「採掘師／園芸師」のいずれかがレベル78以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「ケシ・レイ」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_051<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_051<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_090<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKLA402_03237_QESHIRAE_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
